description: If you want to impress - this is what you need to bake.
story: This festive dish is absolutely beautiful, good when you really want to impress :). Goes well with baked lamb ribs. We’ve cooked this combination for our cosy new year’s dinner.
instructions: With carrot peeler make ribbons out of carrots, eggplant and zucchini.
Cover baking dish with Filo dough (oiling each Filo dough sheet with melted butter). I used 8 layers of Filo.
Spread sour cream and mustard on the Filo.
Start setting vegetables from the center, making circles of different colored carrots, zucchini and eggplant.
Cool down a bit before slicing.
